S01visvantu:1_0: (Viśv 1) punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajñaḥ akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ
S01visvantu:1_1: (Viśv 2) bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo viśvapuryāṃ rājadhānyāṃ viśvāmitro nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamarataskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannaṃ.
S01visvantu:1_3: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ
S01visvantu:1_4: (Viśv 3) so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramati paricārayati.
S01visvantu:1_5: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā
S01visvantu:1_6: (Viśv 4) sāṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā.
S01visvantu:1_7: dārako jāta abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirā pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūs tuṃganāsaḥ sarvāṃgapratyaṃgopetaḥ
S01visvantu:1_8: (Viśv 5) tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate.
S01visvantu:1_9: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti jñātaya ūcur yasmād ayaṃ dārako viśvāmitrasya rājñaḥ putras tasmād bhavatu dārakasya viśvantara iti nāmeti.
S01visvantu:1_11: (Viśv 6) viśvantaro dārakaḥ aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradattaḥ dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanakadhātrībhyāṃ.
S01visvantu:1_12: sa aṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhyate hradastham iva paṅkajaṃ
S01visvantu:1_13: (Viśv 7) sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ.
S01visvantu:1_14: sa yāni tāni rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryam anuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalam abhinirjityādhyāvasatāṃ pṛthag bhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni tadyathā hastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarau dhanuṣy apayāne niryāṇe aṃkuśagrahe pāśagrahe tomaragrahe cchedye bhedye vedhye muṣṭibandhe pādabandhe śikhābandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe marmavedhe akṣaṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyāṃ pañcasu sthāneṣu kṛtāvī saṃvṛttaḥ
S01visvantu:1_15: (Viśv 8) viśvantaraḥ kumāro śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahati tyāge vartate tasya pradānavistaram upaśrutya yojanaśatād abhyarthijano 'bhyāgacchati.
S01visvantu:1_17: (Viśv 9) atha kadācid bodhisatvo maṇikanakarajatavajravidrumavaiḍūryamusāragalvārkendranīlavidyotitaṃ candanavarasārapariṇāmitaṃ siṃhavyāghradvīpicarmapariṇaddhaṃ pavanabalasamajavaiḥ kanakarajatamaṇighaṇṭikāpūrṇitaravaiś caturbhis turagair yuktaṃ syandanavaram adhiruhya nagarād udyānābhimukho niryayau.
S01visvantu:1_18: (Viśv 10) atha kecit pratyarthikaprayuktā viprā vedavedāṃgavidas tvaritatvaritaṃ viśvantarakumāram abhigamyocuḥ jayatu bhavāṃ kṣatriyakumāraḥ ity āha ca
S01visvantu:1_19: sarveṣu khalu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ sarvado bhavān /
S01visvantu:1_20: ratham etad dvijātibhyo dānaṃ tvaṃ dātum arhasi //
S01visvantu:1_21: (Viśv 11) ity evam ukte bodhisatvo laghulaghv eva tasmād rathavarād avatīrya hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditahṛdayas tebhyo dvijātibhyas taṃ rathavaram upadarśayann uvāca
S01visvantu:1_22: yathā mayā rathas tyakto viprebhyaḥ parayā mudā /
S01visvantu:1_23: tathāhaṃ tribhavaṃ tyaktvā spṛśeyaṃ bodhim uttamām //
S01visvantu:1_24: (Viśv 12) so 'pareṇa samayena kundakumudahimarajatasitābhravarṇaṃ saptasujātasupratiṣṭhitacaraṇatalaṃ airāvaṇadviradavilāsagāminaṃ parasvābhāvyalakṣaṇālaṃkṛtaṃ puṇyadarśanaṃ rājyavardhanaṃ nāma gajavaram adhiruhya parituṣṭabhṛtyamitrasevakānuyātrikaiś candra iva nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauṃcamayūraśukaśārikākokilajīvaṃjīvavakanirghoṣitavanaṣaṇḍam udyānabhūmiṃ viniryayau
S01visvantu:1_25: (Viśv 13) atha kecit pratyarthikaprayuktā viprā vedavedāṃgavidas tvaritatvaritaṃ viśvantarakumāram abhigamyocuḥ:
S01visvantu:1_26: jayatu bhavāṃ kṣatriyakumāra ity āha ca
S01visvantu:1_28: dātum enaṃ{d} gajavaram asmabhyas tvam ihārhasi //
S01visvantu:1_29: (Viśv 14) evam ukte bodhisatvas tasmād api gajavarāl laghulaghv evāvatīrya hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditamanās tebhyo dvijātibhyas taṃ gajavaram upadarśayann uvāca
S01visvantu:1_30: yathā mayā gajas tyakto viprebhyaḥ parayā mudā /
S01visvantu:1_31: tathāhaṃ tribhavaṃ tyaktvā spṛśeyaṃ bodhim uttamām //
S01visvantu:1_32: (Viśv 15) śuśrāva ca rājā viśvāmitraḥ putreṇa cātra viśvantareṇa rājyavardhano nāma gajavaraḥ pratyarthikaprayuktebhyo viprebhyo dattaḥ iti.
S01visvantu:1_33: śrutvā ca puna rājñā visvāmitreṇa paramakopakupitena viśvantaraḥ kumāra āhūyoktaḥ:
S01visvantu:1_34: gaccha kumāra na te madviṣaye vastavyam iti.
S01visvantu:1_36: bodhāya mayā kṛtavyavasāyena sarvalokānugrahārthaṃ baddhasannāhena gajo 'sau tyaktas
S01visvantu:1_38: tapovanaṃ vā saṃśṛtya kartavyo niyamaḥ paraḥ //
S01visvantu:1_40: vaktuṃ na tūtsahe vākyaṃ na dāsyāmīti yācakaṃ //
S01visvantu:1_41: (Viśv 17) athaivaṃ kṛtamatir bodhisatvo bhāryāyā mādryāḥ sakāśaṃ abhigamyaitad vistareṇa nivedayāmāsa.
S01visvantu:1_42: tato mādrī sahaśravaṇād eva priyaviprayogāśaṃkitahṛdayā kṛtakarapuṭā bodhisatvam uvāca:
S01visvantu:1_43: āryaputra yady evam ahaṃ api tapovanaṃ yāsyāmi.
S01visvantu:1_44: na śakyaṃ mayā āryaputraviyuktayā muhūrtam api prāṇān dhārayituṃ.
S01visvantu:1_45: gaganam iva candravihīnaṃ sasyavihīnā bhaved yathā pṛthivī /
S01visvantu:1_46: nalinīva jalavihīnā bhartṛvihīnā tathā bhaven nārī //
S01visvantu:1_47: (Viśv 18) bodhisatva uvāca: avaśyam evāvayor ante viyogena bhavitavyaṃ.
S01visvantu:1_48: eṣa hi lokasvabhāvaḥ. tvaṃ ca pravarānnapānaśayanāsanasaṃvasanopacitā paramasukumāraśarīrā.
S01visvantu:1_50: mūlapuṣpaphalāni cāhāro darbhopalakuśakaṇṭakacitāyāṃ mahyāṃ vicaritavyaṃ abhīkṣṇaṃ copavāsa upavasitavyaḥ,
S01visvantu:1_53: tatrāpi ca mayā avaśyaṃ yathāśaktyā dānaṃ deyaṃ.
S01visvantu:1_54: tatra bhavatyā na kathaṃcid anutāpaḥ karaṇīyas tat punar api tāvat saṃpradhāryatām iti.
S01visvantu:1_55: mādrī kathayaty āryaputra yathāśaktyāham āryaputrasya anuvartiṣyāmīti.
S01visvantu:1_56: bodhisatvaḥ kathayati yady evaṃ smartavyā te iyaṃ pratijñeti.
S01visvantu:1_57: (Viśv 19) tato bodhisatvaḥ pitaram abhigamya mūrdhnā praṇipatyovāca
S01visvantu:1_58: kṣamasva yat tāta mayāparāddhaṃ gajapradānaṃ prati pārthivendra /
S01visvantu:1_59: eṣa prayāsyāmi purād araṇyaṃ kośakṣayo mā nṛpate tavābhūd // iti
S01visvantu:1_61: putra tiṣṭha nivartyatāṃ dānān matir iti.
S01visvantu:1_63: pradānān na tv ahaṃ cittaṃ nivarteyaṃ mahīpate //
S01visvantu:1_65: (Viśv 20) tataḥ putraduhitṛkalatrasahitaḥ śokotkaṇṭhaiḥ paurajānapadaśatasahasrair anugamyamāno ratham adhiruhya tasmān nagaravarān nirjagāma.
S01visvantu:1_66: (Viśv 21) atha kaścit puruṣas taṃ ruditaparidevitaśabdaṃ śrutvā mahājanakāyaṃ ca nagaradvāreṇa nirgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvānyatamaṃ puruṣam uvāca:
S01visvantu:1_67: bhoḥ puruṣa kiṃkṛto 'yaṃ mahājanakāyasya rudanaśabda iti.
S01visvantu:1_72: (Viśv 22) tato viśvantaro bodhisatvas tasmān nagaravarān nirgatān paurān yathānyāyam abhigamyovāca:
S01visvantu:1_74: suciram api hi priyasaṃprayogo bhūtvāvaśyam evānte viyogāvasāno bhaviṣyati.
S01visvantu:1_76: sarveṣu lokeṣv avagamya jantoḥ priyair viyogo bhavatīti matvā /
S01visvantu:1_77: kāryā bhavadbhir bhuvi sarvayatnaiḥ sthirāprakaṃpyā ca śamāya buddhiḥ //
S01visvantu:1_79: bhoḥ kṣatriyakumāra itas triṃśanmātrair yojanair adhiṣṭhānaṃ yato 'haṃ bhavato guṇaśravaṇād āgata iti.
S01visvantu:1_80: tad arhasi bhavān anena rathavareṇa me saphalaṃ śramaṃ kartum iti.
S01visvantu:1_81: tato mādrī saṃjātāmarṣā niṣṭhurābhidhānena taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
S01visvantu:1_82: aho dvijasyāsya sudāruṇā matir vane 'pi yo 'bhyarthayate nṛpātmajaṃ /
S01visvantu:1_83: na nāma kāruṇyam ihāsya jāyate narendraputre nṛpatiśriyā cyute //
S01visvantu:1_84: bodhisatva uvāca: evaṃ na khalu na khalu bhavatyā brāhmaṇaḥ paribhāṣaṇīyaḥ. kutaḥ
S01visvantu:1_85: yady ete na bhaveyur arthanadayo mādri pratigrāhakāḥ
S01visvantu:1_86: bodhiṃ kaḥ samavāpnuyād bhuvi naraḥ sarvapradānād ṛte /
S01visvantu:1_89: (Viśv 24) atha bodhisatvas tam apy aśvarathaṃ parameṇa praharṣeṇa tasmai brāhmaṇāya datvovāca
S01visvantu:1_90: annena mātsaryamalapravāhiṇā rathapradānena mamāstv iha dvija /
S01visvantu:1_91: maharṣibhiḥ ṣaḍbhir anupravartito nirāsravo dharmamayo mahārathaḥ //
S01visvantu:1_92: (Viśv 25) tato bodhisatvaḥ pramuditahṛdayas tam api rathavaraṃ brāhmaṇāya datvā kṛṣṇājināṃ kumārīṃ skandhe āropya mādrī ca jālinaṃ kumāraṃ tapovanābhimukhau saṃprasthitau.
S01visvantu:1_94: tato viśvantaro bodhisatvas tasmiṃ tapovane svahṛdayapraritoṣakaraṃ vratam āsthāya vijahāra.
S01visvantu:1_95: (Viśv 26) tena khalu samayena anyatamasmiṃ karvaṭake brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati sma.
S01visvantu:1_97: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramati paricārayati.
S01visvantu:1_98: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāta aṣṭādaśabhir apalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ.
S01visvantu:1_99: sa yadā jujjavayati, tasya jujjuko jujjuka iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā.
S01visvantu:1_100: (Viśv 27) anyatamasmiṃ api karvaṭake brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati caturvedajñas.
S01visvantu:1_102: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramati paricārayati.
S01visvantu:1_103: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato duhitā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā caturdināvadhinā mahatī saṃvṛttā.
S01visvantu:1_105: na mayā kasyacid iyaṃ duhitā rūpeṇa vā kulena vā dhanena vā śilpena vā dātavyāpi tu yo mamāntikāc caturo vedān adhigamiṣyati,
S01visvantu:1_106: (Viśv 28) atha jujjuko mantrārthī mantragaveṣī tasya gṛham upasaṃkrāntaḥ.
S01visvantu:1_107: sa tena brāhmaṇenābhihito: bho māṇava kutas tvaṃ kiṃ vā prārthayasi
S01visvantu:1_108: sa kathayatīcchāmy aham upādhyāyasya pādaśuśruṣāṃ kartuṃ.
S01visvantu:1_109: sa kathayati: śobhanam evaṃ kuruṣva māṇava. karaṇīyam etad brāhmaṇānāṃ.
S01visvantu:1_111: sa medhāvī jātīyaḥ. tena alpīyasā kālena catvāro vedā adhītāḥ
S01visvantu:1_113: mayā pratijñā kṛtā na mayā kasyacid iyaṃ duhitā rūpeṇa vā kulena vā dhanena vā śilpena vā dātavyā.
S01visvantu:1_114: api tu yo mamāntikāc caturo vedān adhigamiṣyati tasya mayeyaṃ dātavyā.
S01visvantu:1_115: anena ca māṇavakena mamāntikāc caturo vedān adhigatā.
S01visvantu:1_117: yady etāṃ dārikāṃ sa pratigṛhṇīyāc chobhanaṃ syāt.
S01visvantu:1_118: (Viśv 31) tasya tenoktaṃ: māṇava mayā pratijñā kṛtā na mayā kasyacid iyaṃ duhitā rūpeṇa vā kulena vā dhanena vā śilpena vā dātavyā,
S01visvantu:1_119: api tu yo mamāntikāc caturo vedān adhigamiṣyati tasya mayedaṃ dātavyā.
S01visvantu:1_120: tvayā ca mamāntikāc caturo vedā adhigatāḥ.
S01visvantu:1_123: tasya tena mahatā śrīsamudayena vivāhaḥ kāritaḥ kṛtvā kathayati:
S01visvantu:1_125: (Viśv 32) sa tāṃ patnīm ādāya svagṛhaṃ gataḥ.
S01visvantu:1_126: sa tayā ucyate: āryaputra sukumārā nāhaṃ śaknomi karma kartuṃ.
S01visvantu:1_128: sa kathayati: bhadre kuto mama upasthāyakaḥ.
S01visvantu:1_129: sā kathayaty āryaputra viśvapuryāṃ viśvāmitro nāma rājā.
S01visvantu:1_130: tasya putro viśvantaro nāma. sa yat kiṃcit yācyate tat sarvaṃ dadāti.
S01visvantu:1_132: sa kathayati: bhadre yady evaṃ sahitaṃ gacchāvaḥ.
S01visvantu:1_133: (Viśv 33) sa tayā sārdhaṃ viśvapuriṃ gatvā pṛcchati: kutra viśvantarakumāras.
S01visvantu:1_135: (Viśv 34) atha jujjukaḥ patnyā sārdhaṃ tapovanaṃ gataḥ.
S01visvantu:1_136: (Viśv 35) tato 'sau brāhmaṇo mādryā mūlaphalārtham abhigatāyās tapovanān nirgatya viśvantaram abhigamyovāca:
S01visvantu:2_1: nūnaṃ tapovanagatau hi phalāmbubhakṣyau bālau sutau nayanatuṣṭikarau manojñau /
S01visvantu:2_2: duḥkhānvitasya jagataḥ parimokṣaṇārthaṃ viśvantaras tyajati kaṃpati yena bhūmiḥ //
S01visvantu:2_3: (Viśv 41) tatas tau bāladārakau pitur āśayaparityāgabuddhim avagamya karuṇakaruṇaṃ rudantau viśvantarasya pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭāv ūcatuḥ:
S01visvantu:2_4: prasīda tāta māvāṃ parityākṣīs tadānīṃ guruvihīnau gamiṣyāvaḥ
S01visvantu:2_5: aṃbā ca tāta niṣkrāntā tvaṃ ca no dātum arhasi /
S01visvantu:2_6: yāvat tām api paśyāvas tato dāsyati nau bhavān //
S01visvantu:2_7: tato bodhisatvaḥ sahaviklavahṛdaya .. .. .. .. .. vadanas tau bāladārakau pariṣvajyovāca: putrakau
S01visvantu:2_8: na me hṛdayaṃ asnigdhaṃ nākṛpā nāpi nairghṛṇaṃ /
S01visvantu:2_10: budhy evāhaṃ parāṃ bodhim abhigamya śivāṃ svayam /
S01visvantu:2_12: (Viśv 42) tatas tau bāladārakau pitur āśayaparityāgabuddhim avagamya karuṇadīnavilaṃbitākṣaraiḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭāv ūcatuḥ
S01visvantu:2_13: yady evaṃ vyavasāyas te vacanād āvayos tvayā
S01visvantu:2_14: vaktavyā jananī tāta kṣantum aṃba tvam ihārhasi //
S01visvantu:2_16: yan nau guror apakṛtaṃ tvayi bālabāvād
S01visvantu:2_17: yady apriyaṃ kvacana kiṃcid udāhṛtaṃ vā /
S01visvantu:2_18: śuśrūṣayā ca paripūritam eva na syād
S01visvantu:2_20: ity uktvā pitaram abhivādya triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya guruvacanapālakau muhurmuhuḥ saṃparivartamānau nayanāmbupariplutākṣakau tasmād āśramapadād viniścakrāmatuḥ.
S01visvantu:2_21: (Viśv 43) tato bodhisatvas tair atikaruṇair bāladārakavacobhiḥ viklavīkṛtahṛdayo bodhau manaḥ praṇidhāya tapova + + + + niṣkrāntamātrayoś ca punar tayor bāladārakayor ayaṃ trisahasramahāsahasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakaṃpito 'nekaiś ca devatāsahasrair hāhākāro 'ntarikṣāj jāto babhūva
S01visvantu:2_22: aho pradānasya māhātmyam aho satvasya niścayaḥ /
S01visvantu:2_23: bālāv imau sutau tyaktvā yan na vikriyate manaḥ //
S01visvantu:2_24: (Viśv 44) tasmiṃś ca samaye mādrī mūlaphalāny ādāyāśramapadābhimukhī saṃprasthitā.
S01visvantu:2_25: tena ca mahatā bhūmikaṃpena tvaritatvaritam evāśramapadaṃ saṃpratasthe.
S01visvantu:2_26: tatrānyatamā devatā siṃharūpadhāriṇī bhūtva mārgam avarudhyamānāvasthitā mā haiva madrī bodhisattvasya sarvasatvanirmokṣaṇakṛtodyogasya dānapāramitāyāṃ vighnam utpādayiṣyatīti.
S01visvantu:2_28: mṛgarājavadhūvilāsini kim idaṃ mām uparudhya tiṣṭhasi
S01visvantu:2_29: dhruvam asmi yathā patiṃ gatā laghu mārgād apasarpa me tathā //
S01visvantu:2_31: tvam api mṛgarājapatnī aham api bhāryā narendrasiṃhasya /
S01visvantu:2_32: dharmeṇa bhavasi bhaginī mṛgarājñi dadasva me mārgam //
S01visvantu:2_33: ity evam uktā sā siṃharūpadhāriṇī devatā tasmān mārgād apakrāntā
S01visvantu:2_34: (Viśv 45) tato mādrī 'nimittāny aprasannānīti matvā muhūrtaṃ cintayāmāsa:
S01visvantu:2_36: yathā ca vanavāsināṃ bhūtānāṃ vidrāvaṇaśabdo vyaktam āśramapade akuśalaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āha ca
S01visvantu:2_37: yathā sphurati me netraṃ yathā rauti vihaṃgamaḥ /
S01visvantu:2_38: kathan nau bālakau tyaktau yathā ca matir utsukā //
S01visvantu:2_39: yathāyaṃ pṛthivīkaṃpo vepate hṛdayaṃ ca me /
S01visvantu:2_40: suvyaktau bālakau tyaktau yathā kāyaś ca sīdati //
S01visvantu:2_41: (Viśv 46) saivam anarthaśatasahasrāṇi cintayantī āsramapadaṃ gatvā praviśya cāśramapadaṃ sasaṃbhrāntā nirīkṣate,
S01visvantu:2_42: na paśyati tau putrakau. tato mādrī viklavahṛdayā vepamānā sthānapadānusāraṃ vikalpayaty asmin pradeśe jālimāṃ kumāraḥ saha bhaginyā mṛgapotakair abhīkṣṇaṃ krīḍitavāṃ.
S01visvantu:2_44: imāni ca tayoḥ krīḍanakāni. tau tu na paśyāmi. atha vā aṃbā na dṛśyata iti parṇakuṭīṃ praviśya śayitau bhaviṣyataḥ
S01visvantu:2_45: (Viśv 47) ity evam āśaṃkāparigatahṛdayā sutadarśanalālasā mūlaphalāny ekānte upanikṣipya bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇā bhartuḥ pādayor nipatya pṛcchaty āryaputra kva gatau tau bāladārakāv iti.
S01visvantu:2_47: tasya tau bālakau dattau tāv anujñātum arhasi //
S01visvantu:2_48: (Viśv 48) athaivam uktā mādrī viṣadigdhaviddheva mṛgī bhūmau nipapāta.
S01visvantu:2_49: jalāśrayoddhṛteva matsī pṛthivyām āvartanaṃ parivartanaṃ karoti sma.
S01visvantu:2_51: pranaṣṭavatseva ca gaur bahuvidhaṃ haṃbhāravair vilalāpa.
S01visvantu:2_53: duḥkhitāv ananubhūtaduḥkhakau kāṃ gatiṃ mama gatau hi putrakau //
S01visvantu:2_55: katham adya nu putrakau mama vrajato 'nyasya vaśena duḥkhitau //
S01visvantu:2_57: na ca me 'dya sudṛṣṭakau kṛtau kṛpaṇair jīvati duḥkhitau bata //
S01visvantu:2_59: kṣāntimārdavaiḥ sadā gurupriyau duḥkhitau hi paramaṃ sutau mama //
S01visvantu:2_60: jñātimātṛparihīnakau ca tau bandhubhiś ca sahasā nirākṛtau /
S01visvantu:2_61: durjanaṃ janam upetya pāpakaṃ duḥkhitau hi paramaṃ sutau mama //
S01visvantu:2_62: kṣuttṛṣāparigṛhātmakau sadā kasya tau vaśam upāgamiṣyataḥ /
S01visvantu:2_63: ārttiduḥkhaparipīḍitau ca tau preṣyabhāvam upayāsyato dhruvam //
S01visvantu:2_64: karma nūnam iha pāpakaṃ mayā anyajanmani sudāruṇaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S01visvantu:2_65: prāṇinaḥ priyaśatair viyojitā yena gaur iva viraumy adharmikā //
S01visvantu:2_66: yena satyavacanena me sadā sarvasatvasamatāṃ nataṃ manas /
S01visvantu:2_67: tena satyavacanena me sutau dāsabhāvagamanād vimucyatām //
S01visvantu:2_68: (Viśv 49) tato mādrī tābhyāṃ bāladārakābhyāṃ ye vṛkṣā ropitakāḥ pālitakāś ca tān kisalayasaṃchannāṇ dṛṣṭvā sasaṃbhramā pariṣvajyovāca
S01visvantu:2_70: cetanā iva rudanti vṛkṣakā bālakāḥ stanavihīnakā iveti //
S01visvantu:2_71: (Viśv 50) punaś ca tayor bāladārakayoḥ krīḍanakāny āśramavāsino mṛgaśāvakān dṛṣṭvā karuṇādīnavilaṃbitair akṣaraiḥ vacanam uvāca
S01visvantu:2_72: duḥkham etad aparam hy analpakam yad ramanti mṛgaśāvakā ime /
S01visvantu:2_74: (Viśv 51) tato mādrī yena mārgeṇa tau bāladārakau gatau taṃ mārgam anusarantī tayor bāladārakayor itaś cāmutaś ca padāny ariktakāni dṛṣṭvā tīvraduḥkhābhyāhatā punar uvāca
S01visvantu:2_76: kvacid gatau gatāvṛttau hā nṛśaṃsa dvijottama //
S01visvantu:2_78: tau hi me hariṇapariplutākṣakau komalaiś caraṇakaiḥ kathaṃ gatāv iti //
S01visvantu:2_79: (Viśv 52) tato bodhisatvas tāṃs tathāparidevanātmikāṃ dṛṣṭvā tābhis tābhiḥ śrutibhir anityatāpratisaṃyuktābhiḥ bahuprakāram anusaṃjñāpayann uvāca
S01visvantu:2_80: na darpān na ca vidveṣān mayā tyaktaṃ sutadvayam /
S01visvantu:2_81: sarvasatvahitārthaṃ tu tyaktau tau dustyajau sutau //
S01visvantu:2_84: tyāgādhiṣṭhānān mādri putrau yadā te tyaktau dustyājau lokanirmokṣaṇārtham /
S01visvantu:2_85: dadyāṃ svāṃ dārāṃ vāhanaṃ cāpi vittaṃ sarvaṃ sarvebhyo dātum eṣā matir me // ity
S01visvantu:2_86: (Viśv 53) atha mādrī dhairyam ālaṃbya cittena bodhisatvam uvāca
S01visvantu:2_87: na karomy antarāyaṃ te mā te bhūn matir anyathā /
S01visvantu:2_88: mām apīcchasi ced dātuṃ nirviśaṃkaḥ prayaccha mām //
S01visvantu:2_91: tam arthaṃ prāpnuhi kṣipraṃ tāraya tribhavāj jagat //
S01visvantu:2_92: (Viśv 54) tataḥ śakro devendras tad atyadbhutam atiduṣkaraṃ mādryā bodhisatvasya ca vyavasāyam avagamya tridaśagaṇaparivṛta upari vihāyasā tadāśramam upagamyodāreṇāvabhāsena tad vanam avabhāsya gaganatalastha eva bodhisatvam uvāca
S01visvantu:2_95: tvam eko niḥsaṃgas tyajasi tanayāṃ snehajanakāṃ
S01visvantu:2_96: dhruvaṃ kṣemaṃ śāntaṃ vimalam arajaṃ prāpsyasi padam //
S01visvantu:2_97: (Viśv 55) tad evaṃ protsāhya bodhisatvaṃ śakro devendraś cintayāmāsa:
S01visvantu:2_99: yanv aham apy asmāt prāthayeyam iti.
S01visvantu:2_100: tato bodhisatvasakāśād apakramya brāhmaṇaveṣam āsthāya punar bodhisatvam uvāca
S01visvantu:2_103: (Viśv 56) tato mādrī saṃjātāmarṣā niṣṭhurābhidhānena taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
S01visvantu:2_104: nirlajjaś cāsi lubdhaś ca tvam iha brāhmaṇādhama /
S01visvantu:2_105: saddharmaniratāṃ yas tvaṃ mām icchasi pativratām //
S01visvantu:2_106: (Viśv 57) tato bodhisatvaḥ karuṇāparigatahṛdayo mādrīṃ nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ.
S01visvantu:2_108: na śocāmy aham ātmānaṃ nāpekṣā me tathātmani /
S01visvantu:2_109: yathā tvām anuśocāmi katham eko bhaviṣyasi //
S01visvantu:2_111: aham iha bhuvi mādri nānuśocyaḥ parimṛgayaṃ padam akṣayaṃ viśokam /
S01visvantu:2_112: tam imam anusara dvijaṃ viśokā mṛgaśaraṇaṃ tv aham āśrame 'bhyupaimi //
S01visvantu:2_114: idam asmiṃ vane dānaṃ paścimaṃ me bhaviṣyati
S01visvantu:2_116: iti viditvā mādrīṃ ca pāṇinā gṛhītvā taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
S01visvantu:2_118: mama bhāryām imāṃ śiṣyāṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ dvijottama //
S01visvantu:2_121: (Viśv 60) tato mādrī bāṣpoparudhyamānā gadgadakaṇṭhī brāhmaṇavaśam āgatā patiputraduhitṛvirahitā idam abhravīt
S01visvantu:2_122: kīdṛṅ mayā kṛtaṃ karma anāryaṃ pūrvajanmasu /
S01visvantu:2_123: naṣṭavatseva gaur yena viraumi vijane vane //
S01visvantu:2_124: (Viśv 61) tataḥ śakro devendro brāhmaṇaveṣam antardhāpya svaveṣeṇa sthitvā mādrīm uvāca
S01visvantu:2_125: na brāhmaṇo 'smi subhage na ca mānuṣo 'smi
S01visvantu:2_126: śakras tv ahaṃ hy asuranāśakaraḥ surendraḥ /
S01visvantu:2_128: tad brūhi kiṃ varam apīcchasi matsakāśāt //
S01visvantu:2_132: (Viśv 62) tathety uktvā mahendraḥ punar āśramaṃ praviśya bodhisatvasakāśam abhijagmivān.
S01visvantu:2_133: mādrīṃ ca vāmena pāṇinā gṛhītvā bodhisatvam uvāca
S01visvantu:2_134: ahaṃ mādrīm imāṃ tubhyaṃ dadāmi paricārikām /
S01visvantu:2_135: na ca te kasyacid deyā nyāsadroho hi garhitaḥ //
S01visvantu:2_136: (Viśv 63) tataḥ śakro devendras taṃ bāladārakaparigṛhītāraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tathā vyāmohayāmāsa yathānyanagaraśaṃkayā tad eva nagaram upagamya tau bāladārakau vikrītum ārabdho yāvad amātyair dṛṣṭvā rājño niveditaṃ
S01visvantu:2_137: etau putrasya te putrau brāhmaṇo 'smin purottame /
S01visvantu:2_138: jālinaṃ ceva kṛṣṇāṃ ca vikrīṇīte ti dāruṇaḥ //
S01visvantu:2_139: (Viśv 64) etac chrutvodbhrāntacittaḥ sa rājā prāha kṣipraṃ darśayadhvaṃ kumārau /
S01visvantu:2_140: nāryaś cakruḥ krośam antaḥpurasthāḥ paurā rājñaḥ kṣipram eyuḥ samīpam //
S01visvantu:2_148: tam ihānayata kṣipraṃ patnyā sārdhaṃ sulocanam //
S01visvantu:2_149: (Viśv 66) tataḥ śakro devendro bodhisatvam abhinamasyamānaḥ svabhavanam upajagāma.
S01visvantu:2_150: (Viśv 67) śakreṇa ca rājani viśvāmitre abhyatīte brāhmaṇāmātyapaurajānapadaiḥ sārdhaṃ tad āśramapadaṃ gatvā bodhisatvaṃ yācitvā svapuram ānīya rājye pratiṣṭhāpitavān.
S01visvantu:2_152: sa śraṃanabrāhmaṇavanīpakasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavānujīvijaneṣu anekaprakārāṇi dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
S01visvantu:2_158: prāpnuvanti narāḥ śuddhim asmiṃ loke paratra ceti //
S01visvantu:2_159: (Viśv 69) yadā viśvāmitreṇa rājñā viśvantaranimittaṃ jujjukāya brāhmaṇāya prabhūtaṃ dhanaṃ dattaṃ tadāsau vistīrṇavibhavo jātaḥ.
S01visvantu:2_161: yā kācit tava śrīsaubhāgyasaṃpat sarvāsau viśvantarakumāram āgamyeti.
S01visvantu:2_162: sa kathayati: kiṃ mama viśvantareṇa kṛtam uttamavarṇaprasūto 'haṃ,
S01visvantu:2_163: (Viśv 70) bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau viśvantaro nāma rājakumāra aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena.
S01visvantu:2_164: yo 'sau jujjuko brāhmaṇa eṣa evāsau devadattas tena kālena tena samayena.
S01visvantu:2_167: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kṛtajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtavedinaḥ svalpam api kṛtaṃ na nāśayiṣyāmaḥ,
S01visvantu:2_168: prāg eva prabhūtaṃ. ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
